author: Richard Garriott
message: Chaos and Order are not enemies, only opposites.
title: Thought of the day

author: Henry Longfellow
message: Perseverance is a great element of success. If you only knock long enough and loud enough at the gate, you are sure to wake up somebody.
title: Thought of the day

author: Harriet Lerner
message: Only through our connectedness to others can we really know and enhance the self. And only through working on the self can we begin to enhance our connectedness to others.
title: Thought of the day

author: Chinese proverb
message: He who deliberates fully before taking a step will spend his entire life on one leg.
title: Thought of the day
